sentences.cn: 安吉拉不停地看了些书.

sentences.en: Diners can enjoy an uninterrupted view of the garden.
sentences.cn: 用餐者对花园的景色一览无余。

sentences.en: Ellora, with its uninterrupted sequence of monuments dating from A.
sentences.cn: 高高的陡峭玄武岩壁上, 34座洞穴庙宇被开凿出来,一座挨一座,延伸2000多米.

sentences.en: Establish reliable supply source and back - up source to ensure uninterrupted production.
sentences.cn: 建立可靠的供应来源及其后备,以确保生产所需.

sentences.en: Fire hosered had the advantage of uninterrupted supply of water.
sentences.cn: 消防检具有持续不间断供水的优势.

sentences.en: He took uninterrupted occupancy of this position for ten years.
sentences.cn: 他持续担任这一职位10年.

sentences.en: However, in a quiet time, the total precipitation her mind, uninterrupted, non - stop.
sentences.cn: 但是在安静的时候, 心里总沉淀着她, 不间断, 不停止.

sentences.en: Lulled by almost uninterrupted economic growth, too many European firms assumed that this would last for ever.
sentences.cn: 近乎持续的经济增长使许多欧洲公司误以为会好景长在。

sentences.en: Madge, therefore , uninterrupted, went on with the wild disjointed chat which her rambling imagination suggested.
sentences.cn: 而玛吉凭着她无拘无束的想象, 自由自在地继续扯谈些不相连贯的事情.

sentences.en: The child always uninterrupted asks why.
sentences.cn: 小孩总是不停的问为什么.

sentences.en: Then I spent an uninterrupted morning writing, which I love.
sentences.cn: 然后我整个早晨都在写作,无人打扰, 这是我喜欢的事情.

sentences.en: They now ran into the business heart of Brooklyn uninterrupted.
sentences.cn: 现在他们畅通无阻地驶进了布鲁克林的商业中心.

sentences.en: We felt it better to withdraw and leave them uninterrupted.
sentences.cn: 我们觉得最好还是走开,不去打搅她们.

sentences.en: We had an uninterrupted view of the stage.
sentences.cn: 我们能清楚地看见舞台。

sentences.en: Work went on as usual inside, uninterrupted by outside repairs.
sentences.cn: 外部装修,内部照常营业.

phrases.tran_cn: 不间断电源；不停电电源
连续运行；不间断服务；无事故运行

trans.tran_cn: 不间断的，连续的，未受干扰的，联绵
